body: Sure Anas, You can add context as Brep and/ or surfaces similar to how we prepare a HBZone. Then that can simply be supplied to _HBObjects input and that will be accounted in your annual daylight simulation. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkvn7IGIypCZR19r7seyT7nY1I2*QZ2BxYVNDagGrMQoEpOHa68lLt0*M5Qobiz40zOjb75hCoAQtwdi90XbNBPZ/Context.JPG) -Devang
